segment.source: Welcome to SIL Transcriber. A project is created online at the {0} admin site. Export a Portable Transcriber Format (PTF) file and import it here.
Click your avatar to transcriber or review.
This file was not exported from the latest version. Reexport your PTF file from the online version.
Not a valid Portable Transcriber File
Not a valid Incremental Transcriber File
Project {name0} was previously imported with a newer file: {date1}
Current data in project {name0} has never been exported.
Current data in project {name0} was last exported {date0}.
Import file will not include latest exported data.
(User interface languages are set in the user profile.)
Please select the preferred default font
Can't find the font you need?
Please select the default font size
All plans, sections, passages, and media files will be removed.
Select project group. Each project relates to a single group. Group members can work on the project.
You are not an admin in this group, so you will be unable to manage the project.
Invalid number of columns ({0}). Expecting 6 columns.
Invalid number of columns ({0}). Expecting 5 columns.
Please select row(s) to remove assignment.
Type the name of the plan, which could be the name of a book of the Bible, a story, a lectionary and so on.
Please select files to be uploaded.
File {0} is an unsupported file type.
Attach available media files to passages (with no current media).
Attachments ({0}) Select if you want to detach the media from the passage.
Log Out and Force Data Reload
Invitation not accepted. You must login with the email that the invitation was sent to.
Do you want to save before leaving this page?
Something went wrong. The developers need to address this issue.
Your session will expire in {0} seconds. Would you like to continue?
Your log in token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
Online changes made since data provided to offline user:
Please select file to be uploaded.
Not a valid Incremental Transcriber File (ITF).
ITF File does not contain current project.
Export a full backup to store locally. Export incremental file to import into online app.
Your login token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
This display allows you to review the transcription that is stored.
{0} active projects depend on this group. Assign each project to some other group before deleting this group.
Type the name and abbreviation of the group.
Choose a person who will act as a {0} for projects in this group.
All Editors are allowed to transcribe.
Groups connect organization members to a project.
If the project does not exist, click the plus button in the Navigation pane to create it.
Existing projects can be associated with this group in Settings.
This role is included in a higher role and cannot be deleted.
Cannot delete users from the All Users group
Find a language by name, code, or country
Enter the email address of the user to invite.
No Projects are associated with this group.
Please click the following link to accept the invitation:
Deleting this organization will prevent any members of the organization from doing work on any of the projects or plans in this organization.
Upload complete Project Data from PTF
Upload Change Data from Offline Extension
You can upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a or .wav format.
Upload a Portable Transcriber File (ptf file).
Upload an Incremental Transcriber File (itf file) exported from the offline extension.
Drag and drop files here, or click here to browse for the files.
Drag and drop a file here, or click here to browse for the file.
You are not a member of a {lang0} Paratext Project.
Your login token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
Your paratext login has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
You must login with a valid paratext login to sync projects.
Are you connected to the Internet?
Are you connected to a {lang0} Paratext project?
Do you have a Paratext Account?
Do you have permission to edit the Paratext project text?
You must satisfy all criteria to sync.
Deleting your user will block you from using the program and remove references to your work.
Receive SIL Transcriber and Language Technology news
Configure the plan, upload media and attach passages
Re-export ptf file online and re-import here
This organization and project are not setup and ready for work yet.
This project must be set up online. Please contact your project administrator for a ptf file that includes tasks.
